2023 film by Bill Oliver

Running time104 minutes[1]CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Our Son is a 2023 American drama film[1] directed by Bill Oliver, from a screenplay by Oliver and Peter Nickowitz. It stars Billy Porter, Luke Evans, Robin Weigert, Andrew Rannells, Isaac Cole Powell and Phylicia Rashad.
It had its world premiere at the 2023 Tribeca Festival on June 10, 2023, and was released by Vertical Entertainment on December 8, 2023.

Billy Porter as Gabriel
Christopher Woodley as Owen
Andrew Rannells as Matthew
Robin Weigert as Pam
Kate Burton as Maggie 'Miggie'
Phylicia Rashad as Maya
Isaac Cole Powell as Solo
Michael Countryman as Jim 'Grumps'
David Pittu as Ian
Cassandra Freeman as Adele
Gabby Beans as Judith
Liza J. Bennett as Claire
Nuala Cleary as Isabella
Francis Jue as Jason
Alfredo Narciso as Lorenzo
Emily Donahoe as Alexandra
Production[edit]
In June 2022, it was reported that Billy Porter and Luke Evans joined the cast of the film, with Bill Oliver directing from a screenplay he wrote alongside Peter Nickowitz.[2] In August 2022, Robin Weigert, Andrew Rannells, Isaac Cole Powell, Phylicia Rashad, and Kate Burton joined the cast of the film.[3]

Release[edit]
Our Son had its world premiere at the 2023 Tribeca Festival on June 10, 2023.[4] It will be released by Vertical Entertainment on December 8, 2023.[5]

Reception[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 86% of 22 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 6.4/10.[6] Metacritic, which uses a weighted average, assigned the film a score of 58 out of 100, based on 6 critics, indicating "mixed or average" reviews.[7]
